Player Command
==============

See: `color <../ingame/color.html>`_ `colours <colours.html>`_ `ansi <ansi.html>`_ `emoji <emoji.html>`_ 

USAGE frames
     frames list
     frames <type>

Use 'frames list' to show which frame themes are supported.
Use 'frames single' to set your frame theme to 'single'.
